    [C++] 3.2 ë‘ ê³µì„ ì¶©ëŒì‹œì¼œë³´ì.

    ì¸í”„ëŸ°ì— ìˆëŠ” í™ì •ëª¨ êµìˆ˜ë‹˜ì˜ í™ì •ëª¨ì˜ ê²Œì„ ë§Œë“¤ê¸° ì—°ìŠµ ë¬¸ì œ íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€ ê°•ì˜ë¥¼ ë“£ê³  ì •ë¦¬í•œ í•„ê¸°ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.ğŸ˜€
    ğŸŒœ ê³µë¶€ì— ì‚¬ìš©ëœ í™ì •ëª¨ êµìˆ˜ë‹˜ì˜ ì½”ë“œë“¤ ë³´ëŸ¬ê°€ê¸°
    ğŸŒœ [í™ì •ëª¨ì˜ ê²Œì„ ë§Œë“¤ê¸° ì—°ìŠµ ë¬¸ì œ íŒ¨í‚¤ì§€] ê°•ì˜ ë“¤ìœ¼ëŸ¬ ê°€ê¸°!


    Chapter 3. ê²Œì„ ë¬¼ë¦¬ ë§›ë³´ê¸° : ê³µ ë‘ ê°œë¥¼ ì¶©ëŒì‹œì¼œë³´ì

    ë²¡í„°, ìƒëŒ€ ì†ë„ ë“±ë“±, í•´ë‹¹ ê°•ì˜ì—ì„œ ë‹¤ë£¨ì—ˆë˜ ë¬¼ë¦¬í•™ì  ê°œë…ë“¤ì´ ë¬¸ê³¼ìƒì¸ ë‚˜ì—ê² ìƒì†Œí•˜ê³  ì˜ ì™€ë‹¿ì§€ ì•Šì•˜ë˜ ê°œë…ì´ë¼ ê°•ì˜ë¥¼ í•„ê¸°í•˜ê¸°ì— ì•ì„œ ê°œì¸ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë”°ë¡œ ê³µë¶€í•˜ì—¬ ì •ë¦¬í•´ë³´ì•˜ë‹¤.

    • ë²¡í„° ê°œë…
    • ë²¡í„° ë‚´ì 
    • ë…¸ë§ ë²¡í„°
    • ìƒëŒ€ì†ë„ì™€ ë°˜ë°œê³„ìˆ˜
    • ì‘ìš©, ë°˜ì‘ìš©, ì¶©ê²©ëŸ‰


    ğŸ“œ RigidCircle.h

    #pragma once

#include "Game2D.h"

namespace jm
{
	class RigidCircle
	{
	public:
		vec2 pos;
		vec2 vel;
		RGB color = Colors::hotpink;
		float radius = 0.1f;
		float mass = 1.0f;

	public:
		void draw()
		{
			beginTransformation();
			{
				translate(pos);
				drawFilledCircle(color, radius - 1e-3f);
				setLineWidth(2.0f);
				drawWiredCircle(Colors::black, radius);
			}
			endTransformation();
		}

		void update(const float & dt)
		{
			static const vec2 gravity = vec2(0.0f, -9.8f);
			static const float coef_res = 0.7f; // coefficient of restitution
			static const float coef_friction = 0.99f; // friction (not physical)

			// numerical integration
			vel += gravity * dt;
			pos += vel * dt;

			// wall collision, friction
			if (1.0f - pos.x <= radius) // right wall
			{
				pos.x = 1.0f - radius;

				if (vel.x >= 0.0f)
					vel.x *= -1.0f * coef_res;
			}

			if (pos.x <= -1.0f + radius) // left wall
			{
				pos.x = -1.0f + radius;

				if (vel.x <= 0.0f)
					vel.x *= -1.0f * coef_res;
			}

			if (pos.y <= -1.0f + radius) // ground
			{
				pos.y = -1.0f + radius;

				if (vel.y <= 0.0f)
					vel.y *= -1.0f * coef_res;

				vel.x *= coef_friction;
			}
		}
	};
}
    • ìì„¸í•œ ì„¤ëª…ì€ ì´ì „ í¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ ì°¸ê³ 
    • ê³µ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ì°ì–´ë‚¼ í´ë˜ìŠ¤
      • ë³€ìˆ˜
        • pos : ê³µì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜
        • vel : ê³µì˜ ì†ë„
        • color : ê³µì˜ ìƒ‰ê¹”
        • radius : ê³µì˜ ë°˜ì§€ë¦„
        • mass : ê³µì˜ ì§ˆëŸ‰
      • í•¨ìˆ˜
        • draw() : ê³µì„ ê·¸ë¦¼
        • update() : ê³µì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜ì™€ ì†ë„ë¥¼ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸í•¨
          • case
            • ì¤‘ë ¥ì— ì˜í•œ ì˜í–¥
            • ê°ê°ì˜ ë²½ì— ë¶€ë”ªì¹  ë•Œ
            • ë°”ë‹¥ìœ¼ë¡œë¶€í„° ë§ˆì°°ë ¥ì„ ë°›ì„ ë•Œ


    ğŸ“œ Vector2.h

    <Vector.h>

T getDotProduct(const Vector2<T>& v) const  // ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë°›ì€ ë²¡í„°ì™€ì˜ ë‚´ì 
{
		return x * v.x + y * v.y;
}

T getMagnitude()  // ë²¡í„°ì˜ í¬ê¸° 
{
		return std::sqrt(x * x + y * y);
}
    • ğŸ“œ Vector2.h ä¸­ ì•Œì•„ì•¼í•  í•¨ìˆ˜
      • getDotProduct(const Vector2& v)
        • ë‚˜ ìì‹ (ë²¡í„°)ì™€ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ë°›ì€ ë²¡í„°ì™€ì˜ ë‚´ì  ê°’ì„ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ê³  ë¦¬í„´í•œë‹¤.
          • VectorëŠ” floatì„ ë‹´ìœ¼ë‹ˆ Tê°€ floatì´ ë˜ì–´ ë‚´ì  ê°’ì´ ë˜ëŠ” float ìŠ¤ì¹¼ë¼ ê°’ ë¦¬í„´
      • getMagnitude()
        • ë²¡í„°ì˜ í¬ê¸°ë¥¼ ê³„ì‚°í•˜ê³  ë¦¬í„´í•œë‹¤.
          • VectorëŠ” floatì„ ë‹´ìœ¼ë‹ˆ Tê°€ floatì´ ë˜ì–´ í¬ê¸° ê°’ì´ ë˜ëŠ” float ìŠ¤ì¹¼ë¼ ê°’ ë¦¬í„´


    ğŸ“œ main : ë‘ ê³µì˜ ì¶©ëŒ ì²˜ë¦¬

    #include "Game2D.h"
#include "Examples/PrimitivesGallery.h"
#include "RandomNumberGenerator.h"
#include "RigidCircle.h"
#include <vector>
#include <memory>

namespace jm
{
	class Example : public Game2D
	{
	public:
		RigidCircle rb0, rb1;

		Example()
			: Game2D()
		{
			reset();
		}

		void reset() 
		{
			// ë‘ ê³µì˜ ë©¤ë²„ ê°’ë“¤ ì´ˆê¸°í™” 
			rb0.pos = vec2(-0.8f, 0.3f);
			rb0.vel = vec2(5.0f, 0.0f); 
			rb0.color = Colors::hotpink;
			rb0.radius = 0.1f;
			rb0.mass = 1.0f; // 

			rb1.pos = vec2(0.8f, 0.3f);
			rb1.vel = vec2(-5.0f, 0.0f); 
			rb1.color = Colors::yellow;
			rb1.radius = 0.15f;
			rb1.mass = rb0.mass * std::pow(rb1.radius / rb0.radius, 2.0f);
		}

		void drawWall()  // ë²½ì„ ê·¸ë¦°ë‹¤.
		{
			setLineWidth(5.0f);
			drawLine(Colors::blue, { -1.0f, -1.0f }, Colors::blue, { 1.0f, -1.0f });
			drawLine(Colors::blue, { 1.0f, -1.0f }, Colors::blue, { 1.0f, 1.0f });
			drawLine(Colors::blue, { -1.0f, -1.0f }, Colors::blue, { -1.0f, 1.0f });
		}

		void update() override
		{
			const float dt = getTimeStep() * 0.4f;
			const float epsilon = 0.5f; // ë°˜ë°œê³„ìˆ˜

			// physics update
			rb0.update(dt);  
			rb1.update(dt);

			// check collision between two rigid bodies
			const float distance = (rb0.pos - rb1.pos).getMagnitude(); 

			if (distance <= rb0.radius + rb1.radius)   // ì¶©ëŒí–ˆì„ ë•Œ 
			{
				// compute impulse
				const auto vel_rel = rb0.vel - rb1.vel;    // ìƒëŒ€ ì†ë„ êµ¬í•˜ê¸°
				const auto normal = (rb0.pos - rb1.pos) / (rb0.pos - rb1.pos).getMagnitude(); // ë…¸ë§ ë²¡í„° êµ¬í•˜ê¸° n1

				if (vel_rel.getDotProduct(normal) < 0.0f) // approaching, ë‘ ê°œì˜ ê³µì´ ê°€ê¹Œì›Œì§€ê³  ìˆì„ ë•Œë§Œ ì¶©ê²©ëŸ‰ ê³„ì‚°
				{      
					const auto impulse = normal * -(1.0f + epsilon) * vel_rel.getDotProduct(normal) /
						((1.0f / rb0.mass) + (1.0f / rb1.mass));

					// update velocities of two bodies
					rb0.vel += impulse / rb0.mass; // ğŸ”´ì›ì˜ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ì†ë„ 
					rb1.vel -= impulse / rb1.mass; // ğŸŸ¡ì›ì˜ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ì†ë„
				}
			}

			// draw
			drawWall();
			rb0.draw();
			rb1.draw();

			// reset button
			if (isKeyPressedAndReleased(GLFW_KEY_R)) reset();
		}

	};
}

int main(void)
{
	jm::Example().run();

	return 0;
}
    • RigidCircle rb0 : ğŸ”´ê³µ ê°ì²´
    • RigidCircle rb1 : ğŸŸ¡ê³µ ê°ì²´

      • ì†ë„ëŠ” ë°˜ëŒ€ ë°©í–¥

        • ğŸ”´ì§ˆëŸ‰ì„ 1.0fì´ë¼ê³  ê°€ì •í•œë‹¤ë©´
      • rb1.mass = rb0.mass * std::pow(rb1.radius / rb0.radius, 2.0f);
        • ğŸŸ¡ì§ˆëŸ‰ì€ ğŸ”´ë³´ë‹¤ ë°˜ì§€ë¦„ í¬ë©´ ğŸ”´ì§ˆëŸ‰ë³´ë‹¤ ë” í¬ë„ë¡ ì¡°ì •.
        • 3ì°¨ì›ì´ë¼ë©´ 2.0f ì´ ì•„ë‹Œ 3.0fìœ¼ë¡œ ì„¸ì œê³±í•´ì•¼ í•¨.

    â­void update() overrideâ­

    ë§¤ í”„ë ˆì„ë§ˆë‹¤ ì‹¤í–‰ë˜ë©° ë‘ ê³µì˜ ì¶©ëŒ ì²˜ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•´ì£¼ê³  ê·¸ë¡œ ì¸í•œ ë‘ ê³µì˜ ìœ„ì¹˜ì™€ ì†ë„ë¥¼ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ í•´ì¤„ ê²ƒì´ë‹¤.

    • const float epsilon = 0.5f;

    • rb0.update(dt); rb1.update(dt);

        • \(\vert{p_0-p_1}\vert\)

        • const auto impulse = normal * -(1.0f + epsilon) * vel_rel.getDotProduct(normal) /((1.0f / rb0.mass) + (1.0f / rb1.mass));

            • \[j={-(1+\epsilon)\vec{v_{0\vert{1}}}\cdot\vec{n_1}\over{1\over{m_0}}+{1\over{m_1}}}\]
          • const auto impulseëŠ” ì¶©ê²©ëŸ‰(\(j\))ì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ ì¶©ê²© ë²¡í„° (\(\vec{J}=jÃ—\vec{n_1}\))ë‹¤.
            • ê°€ì†ë„ë¡œì„œ ê³µì˜ ì†ë„ì— ë²¡í„°ë¥¼ ë”í•´ì£¼ì–´ì•¼ í•˜ë‹ˆê¹Œ ì¶©ê²©ëŸ‰(\(j\))ì— ë…¸ë§ ë²¡í„°(\(\vec{n_1}\))ë¥¼ ê³±í•´ ì¶©ê²© ë²¡í„°(\(\vec{J}\))ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆë‹¤.
            • \(\vec{J}=\vec{n_1}Ã—j\) = normal * -(1.0f + epsilon) * vel_rel.getDotProduct(normal)/((1.0f / rb0.mass) + (1.0f / rb1.mass))
              • ì™¼ìª½ ë°‘ì¤„ì´ \(\vec{n_1}\)ì´ê³  ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ ë°‘ì¤„ì´ ì¶©ê²©ëŸ‰(\(j\))ì´ë‹¤.

        • ë‘ ê³µì˜ ì¶©ëŒë¡œ ì¸í•œ ğŸ”´ê³µ,ğŸŸ¡ê³µ ì†ë„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ (ê°€ì†ë„ ë”í•´ì£¼ê¸°)
          • rb0.vel += impulse / rb0.mass;
          • rb1.vel += impulse / rb1.mass;
